NPC.name: Celune
NPC.description: This blonde haired harpy has threaded leather strips through her hair, her feathery wings are grey and brown and well kept. She wears nothing except a tan skirt and a leather belt with a single bag hanging from a thread from it. Personality she seems a tad twitchy, unable to sit still she's constantly moving and fidgeting about.

missText.text: the avians's claws fails to connect with TARGET

hitText.text: the avian hits TARGET for VALUE points of damage
